testcase.name: Full User Journey - First Time User › should complete entire flow: onboarding → upload → payment → generation → results
Full User Journey - First Time User › should handle generation failure gracefully
Full User Journey - First Time User › should allow user to leave and return during generation
Full User Journey - Different Styles › should generate photos with professional style
Full User Journey - Different Styles › should generate photos with lifestyle style
Full User Journey - Different Styles › should generate photos with creative style
Full User Journey - Error Recovery › should recover from network interruption during upload
Full User Journey - Error Recovery › should handle payment timeout
Full User Journey - Error Recovery › should handle partial generation (only 15/23 photos)
Returning Pro User Journey › should skip onboarding and go directly to dashboard
Returning Pro User Journey › should display existing personas on dashboard
Returning Pro User Journey › should create new persona without payment prompt
Returning Pro User Journey › should view existing persona photos
Returning Pro User Journey › should download all photos as ZIP
Returning Pro User Journey › should create multiple personas sequentially
Returning Pro User Journey › should handle Pro status expiration gracefully
Returning Pro User Journey › should preserve state across browser sessions
Returning User - Edge Cases › should handle corrupted localStorage gracefully
Returning User - Edge Cases › should sync Pro status with backend
Returning User - Edge Cases › should handle deleted avatar gracefully
Returning User - Edge Cases › should handle concurrent generations

Payment Flow - Premium Tier (1499 RUB, 23 photos) › should process premium tier payment correctly
Payment Status Polling › should poll payment status until success
Payment Status Polling › should handle permanent payment failure

Referral Code Application › should ignore invalid referral code
Payment Security › should not allow duplicate payments
Payment Security › should require valid device ID
Edge Cases › should handle network errors during payment creation

Edge Cases › should handle browser back button during payment
Edge Cases › should handle page refresh during status polling

Payment Flow - T-Bank Integration › should poll payment status after redirect

Payment Flow - T-Bank Integration › should update localStorage after successful payment
Payment Flow - T-Bank Integration › should navigate to generation after successful payment
Payment Webhook Processing › should process webhook correctly
Payment Webhook Processing › should reject webhook with invalid signature
Payment Webhook Processing › should handle duplicate webhook delivery

Payment Edge Cases › should prevent double payment for same generation
Payment Edge Cases › should handle user closing payment window without completing

Referral Code Application › should preserve referral code after T-Bank redirect
Referral Code Application › should apply referral code from manual input
Referral Code Application › should validate referral code format
Referral Earning on Payment › should calculate 10% earning on successful payment
